entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cobourg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:29 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cobourg 03:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: 2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: WNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
